intro: Prasophyllum muelleri, commonly known as the pink fairy莲, is a terrestrial orchid native to Australia. It is characterized by its slender, leafless stems and clusters of delicate, pinkish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils in open habitats such as heathlands and woodlands. It is adapted to dry conditions and often blooms during the cooler months. Prasophyllum muelleri is a member of the orchid family and is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological significance.
